summary: Everett and his party-hungry buddies embark on an all-night road-trip to the Florida beaches, for a week of fun, sun, and beautiful women. Mayhem ensues when 2 jealous girl-friends show up ... See full summary Â»

director: Director: Stuart A. Goldman (as Stuart Goldman)
title: Sin faldas y a lo loco
